about_the_game:
The Building Paint Pack is a cosmetic DLC that includes new skins for all your buildings no matter what stage of the terraforming plan your savegame is in.

This pack will change the appearance of the buildings in all your colonies to help you make Mars YOUR home.

Skins included for:

· Core buildings, such as Spaceports, Hyperloops, and more.
· Mines and factories of all levels.
· All types and sizes of colonies.
· All the energy production buildings.
· Both attack and defense military buildings.
· And all the buildings from the terraforming plan.

41 new building skins (one for each) for a whole new look!

And it's FREE!
